thread.title: ASICS Tiger to Release Special ‘Beauty and the Beast’ GEL-Lyte III & V Edition Sneakers
thread.title_full: ASICS Tiger to Release Special ‘Beauty and the Beast’ GEL-Lyte III & V Edition Sneakers

author: Jack Drummond
title: ASICS Tiger to Release Special ‘Beauty and the Beast’ GEL-Lyte III & V Edition Sneakers
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
ASICS Tiger is dropping a series of new special edition GEL-Lyte III and GEL-Lyte V sneakers to celebrate the release of Disney’s new live-action Beauty and the Beast film.
Releasing March 3 at Paris’ colette store, the sneakers are a self-contained premium pack using fabrics such as leather, suede, denim and mesh with a split tongue. Colorways are muted and soft, ranging from white and birch colorways to represent Belle, and darker “coffee bean” with indigo representing The Beast.
To top things off, Disney and ASICS Tiger are giving Highsnobiety readers a chance to win a pair of the premium GEL-Lyte III sneakers for someone special. Delivered in a special one-of-a-kind wooden collectors edition shoebox, the sneakers are packed and surrounded by white and cream roses referencing the fabrics and colors of the film as well as the colorways of the sneakers.
To be in with a chance of winning, follow @asicstigerhq ’s Instagram, like the post below, and comment tagging the friend you want to win.*
We’ve teamed up with Disney to give away this very special edition of the GEL Lyte III Disney’s “Beauty and the Beast” delivered in a one of a kind collector’s box. Follow @asicstigerhq on Instagram, like this post and you could win these for someone special by tagging them in the comments. The winner will be drawn on 10.03.2017 #AsicsTigerXDisney #BeautyAndTheBeast T’s & C’s in the link in our bio 
A post shared by ASICS Tiger (@asicstigerhq) on Mar 1, 2017 at 7:06am PST 

Alternatively, you can head to colette store from March 3 where fans of the movie and brand can cop a pair, too. Visit ASICSTiger.com for more info. Disney’s live-action Beauty and the Beast hits cinemas March 17.
